brainly_data.question: The half-life for beta decay of strontium-90 is 28.8 years. a milk sample is found to contain 10.3 ppm strontium-90. how many years would pass before the strontium-90 concentration would drop to 1.0 ppm?
brainly_data.subject: Chemistry
